# Plugin SETUP:

## Enable WebSocket Server from the settings as follows:

	Servers/Clients
		Websocket Server

## Configure with the following settings:

These settings shouldnt need to be changed, these are the default Streamer.bot settings.

	Auto Start: On
	Address: 127.0.0.1
	Port:8080
	Endpoint: /
	Authentication: Disabled

## Import the supporting actions:

Copy the below string and paste it into Streamer.bot via the IMPORT button at the top.

	

## How to use the plugin with OBS:

You should have a window appear after this step that displays both your Twitch and YouTube chats.

	1. in OBS at the top of the screen you will see the "Docks" tab. 
	2. Click Docks > Custom Browser Dock
	3. Under Dock Name enter a name that describes our app (Example: "UUDChatBot")
	4. Under URL enter "https://uud-dev.github.io/"


## Everything should be setup and ready!

you should see a "connected" message appear.
